sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export default function RemedyDetail({ remedy, onBack }) { if (!remedy) return null; return (

{remedy.name}

Description

{remedy.description}

Ingredients

    {remedy.ingredients.map((ingredient, idx) => (
  • {ingredient}
    • ))}

Preparation Method

    {remedy.preparationMethod.map((step, idx) => (
  1. {step}
    2. ))}

Dosage

{remedy.dosage}

Benefits

{remedy.benefits}

Precautions

{remedy.precautions}

); }
